title: Mixed Reality and Pervasive Learning Environment Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: A process exploring how in-service teachers can design pervasive learning environments based on mixed reality for application in actual classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can design pervasive learning scenarios linked to curricula by integrating various Web 2.0 tools and augmented reality (AR) applications.
Learners can implement mixed reality-based learning activities that connect physical and virtual spaces step-by-step.
Learners can develop a pervasive learning environment that considers learner interaction and content accessibility through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
